Each recovery code can be used once to a: Woate ŋu azã gbugbɔgaxɔ ƒe kɔda ɖesiaɖe zi ɖeka atsɔ age ɖe wò akɔnta me eye woaɖee ɖa le ezazã vɔ megbe. Ne èhiã geɖe wu la, zi Regenerate Codes si le etame dzi.

Ensure your account is using a long, ran: Kpɔ egbɔ be wò akɔnta le nyagbe didi aɖe si woɖo ɖe ɖoɖo nu zãm be wòanɔ dedie .
Enter the 6-digit code from your authent: Ŋlɔ xexlẽdzesi 6 ƒe kɔda si tso wò Authenticator app la me.

Once your account is deleted, all of its: Ne wonya tutu wò akɔntabubua ɖa ko la, woatutu eƒe nunɔamesiwo kple nyatakakawo katã hã ɖa tegbee. Taflatse ɖo kpe edzi be yedi be yeatutu wò akɔntabubua ɖa tegbee.
Ne wonya tutu wò akɔnta ko la, woatutu eƒe nunɔamesiwo kple nyatakakawo katã ɖa tegbee. Taflatse ŋlɔ wò nyagbe ɣaɣla nàtsɔ aɖo kpe edzi be yeadi be yeatutu yeƒe akɔnta tegbee.
or, enter the code manually: alo, ŋlɔ kɔda la kple asi .

Please enter your new password below: Taflatse ŋlɔ wò nyagbe yeye si le ete la ɖe ete .
Please verify your email address by clic: Taflatse ɖo kpe wò e-mail adrɛs dzi to asiƒoƒo ɖe kadodo si míeɖo ɖe wò fifia to e-mail dzi la dzi.
Recovery codes let you regain access if: Recovery codes na nègakpɔa mɔ na wò ne èbu wò 2FA dɔwɔnua. Dzra wo ɖo ɖe nyagbe ɣaɣlawo dzikpɔla si le dedie me.
Reset password: Gbugbɔ ɖo nyagbe ɣaɣla la ɖe ɖoɖo nu .

To finish enabling two-factor authentica: Be nàwu nu eve ƒe kpeɖodzinana nu la, lé ŋku ɖe QR-kɔda la ŋu alo nàŋlɔ Setup ƒe safuia ɖe wò Authenticator app la me.

Two-factor authentication is now enabled: Wowɔa nu eve ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi ŋudɔ fifia. Scan QR code la alo ŋlɔ Setup ƒe safuia ɖe wò Authenticator app la me.
Update the appearance settings for your: Trɔ asi le dzedzeme ƒe ɖoɖowo ŋu na wò akɔnta .
Update your account's appearance setting: Wɔ wò akɔntabubu ƒe dzedzeme ƒe ɖoɖowo yeyee .
Update your name and email address: Wɔ wò ŋkɔ kple e-mail adrɛs yeyee .
Verify Authentication Code: Kpɔ ɖaseɖiɖi ƒe kɔda la ɖa .
When you enable two-factor authenticatio: Ne èwɔ nu eve ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi ŋudɔ la, woabia tso asiwò be nàwɔ pin si le dedie le gege ɖe eme me. Woate ŋu axɔ pin sia tso TOTP-kpekpeɖeŋunadɔdasi si le wò fon dzi la me.
With two-factor authentication enabled,: Ne wowɔ eve-nu ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi ŋudɔ la, woabia tso asiwò be nàwɔ pin si le dedie, si wowɔ le vome le gege ɖe eme me, si nàte ŋu axɔ tso dɔwɔnu si TOTP do alɔe le wò fon dzi.
